== Kozhinjampara (627659) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Kozhinjampara is a village in the [[Chittur]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 1106 hectares and harbouring 2919 households with total population of 12311 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Chittur-thathamangalam]] is at a distance of 12 km. Male population is 6042 and female population is 6269. Scheduled Caste Population is 825 and Scheduled Tribes population is 24. Census Location Code of the village is 627659<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 9394 (76.31%)
* Literate male population: 4945 (81.84%)
* Literate female population: 4449 (70.97%)
